Jake

ChoCo1&2

Introduction

Yeom Yechan, also known as Jake, is a Korean-American dancer, singer, and rapper under ChoCo Entertainment. He made his debut as a member of the co-ed group ChoCo1&2 on June 1, 2023 with the release of the album "ChoCo Takes Hollywood (MAX)".

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024. On November 29, he was eliminated in episode 8 after ranking 45th place.
